summary: Nothing any other Bodyslide user can't easily replicate, but what the hell?
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:
[/b]Starting out with the 7B Natural Preset for UUNP BodySlide as a base, I just played around for a bit, and decided, what the hell? I don't see many BBW mods on here, and though I'm not into BBW myself, I've run across quite a few people who are. So, [i]voila[/i], a new BodySlide Preset for your use, pleasure, and perhaps a few laughs.

Installation Instructions:
I cannot guarantee that NMM will properly install this for you. Thus, I highly recommend using this simple, easy-to-follow guide for manual installation.

1. Install BodySlide and DIMONIZED UNP from right here on the Nexus.

2. Download the file.

3. Open up your Skyrim folder, then Data, CalienteTools, BodySlide, and SliderPresets

4. Drop/copy the file to the SliderPresets folder.

5. Open up Bodyslide, look for "UUNP - 7B Low-BBW" (without quotations) in the Preset drop-down, and select it.

6. Press Build, and you're done. The body will be viewable within your game, so long as both BodySlide and UUNP were installed properly.

Disclaimer:
I do not own Skyrim, BodySlide, UUNP, UNP, or 7B.

Credits:
Bethesda - For Skyrim. Without them, none of the mods here would exist.
dimon99 - For UUNP/UNP.
Caliente - For BodySlide
Sevennity for 7B
author: No one of consequence
